title: Ekushey Book Fair 2026 to begin from February 20
body: Amar Ekushey Book Fair 2026 will begin on February 20 and continue until March 15. The decision was made at an emergency meeting held this afternoon at the Shaheed Munier Chowdhury Auditorium of Bangla Academy. Bangla Academy's Public Relations Department confirmed the information to media through an email. The meeting was attended by Cultural Affairs Secretary Md Mofidur Rahman, Bangla Academy Director General Prof Mohammad Azam, Dhaka University Proctor Prof Saifuddin Ahmed, along with directors of Bangla Academy, representatives of publishers, and members of law enforcement agencies. The meeting unanimously decided that the fair will be inaugurated at 11:00 am on February 20 and will run until March 15. Earlier, on September 18, authorities announced that the 2026 edition of the fair would be held from December 17 this year to January 17, 2026. However, following protests from publishers and writers, the decision was withdrawn 10 days later on September 28.
